name: Parkopedia
0:
”Alexa, open Parkopedia”
”Alexa, ask Parkopedia to find parking”
”Alexa, ask Parkopedia to find parking near me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: parkopedia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
From the global leader in digital parking services, the Parkopedia Skill allows US drivers to find, reserve and pay for parking lots and garages, either in advance or during your journey. When on the move, keep your hands on the wheel and focus on the road by accessing Parkopedia’s predictive availability service through Alexa, helping you to find available parking either at your current location or desired destination based on arrival time, with reservations and payments all completed via Alexa and Amazon Pay.

With detailed information on thousands of parking locations, Parkopedia can now help you find, book and pay for your parking, all with your voice!

TIPS:
- For seamless booking, enable the Linking Account as well as Skill permissions to allow access to Amazon Pay and Location Services. In the Alexa app, go to Skills & Games, Your Skills, and select Parkopedia to manage permissions.
- The Parkopedia Skill provides information and pricing for parking garages and lots near your destination.
- You can reserve/book parking at select facilities directly through the Parkopedia Skill.
- When a parking space is pre-booked, a parking pass will be sent to the email affiliated with your Amazon Pay account.
- To help protect against unwanted ordering, you can enable a four-digit Voice Code under Settings in the Alexa app. Just select Settings, Alexa Account, and then Voice Purchasing.
 
To cancel a payment or booking, or to request a refund please contact Parkopedia support at bookings@parkopedia.com
